content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
)
WITH(
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count INT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
    year VARCHAR(4),
    month VARCHAR(4)
) AS trip_data

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT payment_type)
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'trip_data_green_delta',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS trip_data
WHERE year = '2020'
